--- In gladiator@y..., bluedrgnkid@a... wrote:
> Something for 10, it is endless, because you can download DPH's 
scenarios.

#10 is about critiquing my own scenarios: the good, the bad, and the 
ugly.  I plan on taking my time, going through 3-5 scenarios at a time 
and explaining the concepts behind the design of each scenario and 
asking for opinions.

If anyone else wants to have discussion about his/her own scenarios 
and is willing to offer comments on the design, I'll put on the list 
of things to discuss.  I'm shooting to have a topic for every week 
this entire year.  I now have things covered through the end of June 
and slightly beyond.
